description: T.1 Lime - Repollard to previous secondary pollard points, remove suckers, epicormic growth & deadwood.T.2 Lawson Cypress - Crown lift to 4m from ground level.G.3 Elder/Holly saplings beneath the Lawson cypress - Fell. T.3 Beech - Crown lift to 2.5m from ground level. T.4 Thuja - Crown lift to give 4m from ground level over driveway. T.5 Thuja - Crown lift to give 4m from ground level over driveway.T.7 Thuja - Crown lift to give 4m from ground level over driveway.T.8 Lawson Cypress - Remove 7 lowest branches on right hand side & Crown lift to give 4m from ground level over driveway.T.9 Purple Leaf Plum - Crown lift to 2.5m from ground level. T.10 Yew - Crown lift to give 4m from ground level over driveway.
